t: What is Ortholite? (Compared with Memory Foam & Adidas Boost)
s: January 7, 2020 - An Ortholite insole is simply an insole utilizing Orthalite foam as the cushioning material. The Ortholite foam is usually lined with thin fabric or other material to reduce friction between your foot and the Ortholite foam which would rub and be uncomfortable.
